data.actual_result: the running line starts moving from the beginning
data.expected_result: the running line should continue to move
data.short_description: Spotify invitation updates after keyboard opens/closes
data.steps_to_repro: - Ask someone to send "Spotify Invite" - Look carefully at this invitation embed - Open your keyboard - Observe Invite - Close keyboard - Observe Invite - Watch the video so you can understand it better
